thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: Zach Khan

author: Zach Khan
title: Zach Khan
text:
In the middle of my transaction I had to visit my family in Canada. Joel was in charge of contacting me to schedule a meeting. Due to poor connection our call kept dropping, but Joel did not give up. He was persistence, professional and took customer service to the next level.
If every team member of Lencred is half as dedicated as Joel, the company is bond to be a benchmark for excellence...
Thank you
Zach K.
